title: Bill L. Atin
profileStatement: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

activities.description: Achieved a 1st in first year. Modules include Ancient Latin, Latin Language, Linguistics Through the Ages and English Etymology. Expected to graduate with a 2:1.

**A Levels:** Latin (A*), Further Latin (A*), Additional Further Latin (A)
**GCSEs:** 11 Grade A* including Maths and English

Starting in September 2021, will work as part of a team of Latin consultants on-site at customers and together with customers businesses and Latin specialists to help them achieve their desired business outcomes quickly. Will teach and coach customer teams and external partners in how to best use Latin.
Latin research with books, libraries, research papers. Researched Latin with numerous sources and cross-checked against published papers and academic journals.
Received training in Latin, ancient Latin, classical Latin, other Latin, more Latin, extra Latin, additional Latin and super Latin.
Championed key project and redeveloped library resources in accordance with university development guidelines. Collaborated across departments to collate content.
